alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BERTIE...EASTERN NORTHAMPTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HERTFORD COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Lewiston Woodville, or 15 miles southwest of Aulander, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Roxobel around 215 PM EDT. Rich Square around 220 PM EDT. Woodland around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Republican, Jackson, Burden, Bryantown, and Boones Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
